page.title: 11THE BREAN LEISURE CENTRE(2)
page.content: Other activities going on during the eek in the open arena include,an open air market,Greyhound racing,Donkey Derby's and other events. Inside the leisure centre is the farmers tavern.It has a bar and a dancefloor.It is well furnished.You can buy food there as-well as drinks.There are also a couple of amusement machines. There is a small club for golfers.You can go into the club and bar if you are a member.We asked a few people what they thought of the centre. We asked people if they'd been to the leisure centre before.Most of them had.They also said it wasn't very crowded there,it was quiet,but there is enough to do.The trade was quiet,not many there only weekenders.This was probably because the weather was bad.
